title: At a glance stopped showing upcoming calendar events
content:
Hello, I started having issues in the last days, at a glance stopped showing upcoming events 30 minutes before schedule. I really miss this information.

I checked related questions and answers, like enabling showing all notifications on screen, allowing "calendar events" and "reminders" in `at a glance` preferences.

Is there a way to "reset" to default settings? Or a hidden config I deleted?
